item.title: Fourpoint Privacy Policy
item.description: This policy applies to all information collected or submitted on John Davis' website and Fourpoint for iPhone, iPad and any other devices and platforms. INFORMATION WE COLLECT Through using Fourpoint you enter information about your courses across multiple semesters and years of school. The following information is synced between your devices using Appleâ€™s CloudKit technology. This information is not shared with me, the developer. GITHUB This website is hosted by GITHUB.
